name: nnRogue - Dream of the Seer
description:
Roguelike 7DRL game.

Find the Ultimate Weapon in the dungeon.

F1 - help 

Start game.

Enter a name for your hero. New name - create new hero, or an existing one to continue. It is possible reenter a dead hero name, he will restart from the beginning. You can see a list of the current heroes in progress.

Usual roguelike controls. 

cursor up/down/left/right - move/attack adjacent monster

f - fire a bow (from range, damages one nearest monster)

z - zap a wand (damages everything in radius from hero)

w - wear/equip weapon/armor

d - drop item from/show inventory (item will dropped forever)

q - quaff potion

t - teleport down a level, if you stand on teleport place '>', '<' = final teleport to win

escape - save & exit/back to previous screen

+,- -> zoom in/out UI, on start screen change color

mouse scroll - zoom in/out dungeon

F2 - change display resolutions from min 800x600  to max 1920x1080, recommended 1600x900, minimum 1024x768
